issue.title: www.macrumors.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.macrumors.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.macrumors.com%2F) ### Comment > Hi. This is a new issue I haven't had until today with MacRumors. When I open the web, no images are shown. If I close Safari and open it again, the images remain lost. If I disable AdGuard, all the content from the web page returns. There must be something you or the MacRumors developers have changed that prevents the pics to be shown. Please, investigate it. Thank you. Best. Antonio ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.macrumors.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.macrumors.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.macrumors.com%2F) ### Comment > Hi. This is a new issue I haven't had until today with MacRumors. When I open the web, no images are shown. If I close Safari and open it again, the images remain lost. If I disable AdGuard, all the content from the web page returns. There must be something you or the MacRumors developers have changed that prevents the pics to be shown. Please, investigate it. Thank you. Best. Antonio ### Screenshots

issue.title: open.spotify.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2F) ### Comment > Spotify player gets stuck on ads sometimes on web player with AdGuard enabled - no songs, nothing, not even ad plays. Only solution is to refresh the browser and replay the playlist. Trying to change playlist doesn't work either, completely stuck playerand now playing view. While with AdGuard disabled, ads load normally and player works as intended. One important thing: It happens after 2-3 times ads are skipped. e.g I open player, play a playlist, ads come normally due course, gets skipped twice or even thrice, songs playing uninterrupted, after that it gets stuck on ad and nothing plays. Like spotify detects adblocker is on after 2-3 skips and blocks plays (guess). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/83mi74u948w0g4kgws88k0sg8g8k4sg9pssix2rkdg.png?nc=1)

issue.title: Google Play: free.vpnrussia.secure.unlimited.turbo.unblock.proxy

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=free.vpnrussia.secure.unlimited.turbo.unblock.proxy](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dfree.vpnrussia.secure.unlimited.turbo.unblock.proxy) ### Comment > Несколько лет пользовался днс "dns.adguard.com", всё было великолепно, в приложениях и играх из гугл плей не появлялась реклама вообще. А сегодня 5 декабря вдруг начала появляться реклама во всех приложениях, хотя днс работает, получается он хоть и активен но потерял свои возможности, в чем проблема и как это исправить? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/cyxi24gebzwcoowc88000ssok44cwgwg2qzmzts2tk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/agp3r3qfj4g880o0s88w8wgsckwggs02fwn2kasjrm.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/71ark8i5kzwo84ksc0w4gokskg484ww5pvbi7c2tfo.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS DNS setup: | Device or router settings DNS server: | Private AdGuard DNS server System version: | `Android ` Browser: | Chrome Blocklists: | General:
AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
> Странно. Может утечка DNS? Можно проверить с AdGuard для Android с включенной защитой DNS. Или новое наше приложение только для применения DNS https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adguard.dnsclient

Увы, даже с этим приложением при входе видна реклама 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c40d741d-3e47-4196-a826-84ff98724bbd)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/341cf8b5-d276-4115-bd7f-ab817f16b7e6)

issue.title: www.macrumors.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.macrumors.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.macrumors.com%2F) ### Comment > Hi. This is a new issue I haven't had until today with MacRumors. When I open the web, no images are shown. If I close Safari and open it again, the images remain lost. If I disable AdGuard, all the content from the web page returns. There must be something you or the MacRumors developers have changed that prevents the pics to be shown. Please, investigate it. Thank you. Best. Antonio ### Screenshots

issue.title: [False Negative]: add 11 phishing domains (bitboxinsurance[.]com, exodus[.]net-sys[.]at, ...)
issue.body:
> [!IMPORTANT] > ## Executive Summary > > This report documents 11 domain(s) that have been identified as part of active phishing operations. These domains exhibit characteristics consistent with malicious infrastructure and pose an immediate security risk to internet users. The following 11 domain(s) have been analyzed and confirmed as participating in phishing campaign(s): ``` bitboxinsurance.com exodus.net-sys.at ff-io.at ff-io.cc fixfloat.vip v3simpleswap.com simple-swap.dev simlpeswap.easy-exchange.pro exoduwallet.io scanledgerwallet.com trezorwalletsupport.com ``` ## Threat Analysis ### Phishing Attack Details These domains are part of a phishing campaign targeting cryptocurrency companies and cryptocurrency holders/investors. Attackers may use fake login pages, fake Web3 wallet connection prompts, fake cryptocurrency exchange/swap interfaces, or modified/malicious software to steal cryptocurrency seed phrases/keys. ### Technical Details - Cloaked. This means: if a request does not meet certain internal rules of the attacker, the request may be redirected to a non-existent subdomain "www.www.", a legitimate website, or display various HTTP errors such as 403, 404, 502, etc., SSL certificate errors, infinite loading, or a fake Cloudflare (or other service) CAPTCHA, or show content distinguishable from the phishing page. ### Detections & Targeted Brands - `bitboxinsurance.com` targets Bitbox Swiss (bitbox.swiss) - VirusTotal: **2 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/bitboxinsurance.com/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=bitboxinsurance.com - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=bitboxinsurance.com - `exodus.net-sys.at` targets Exodus (exodus.com) - VirusTotal: **3 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/exodus.net-sys.at/detection - `ff-io.at` targets FixedFloat (ff.io) - VirusTotal: **2 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/ff-io.at/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=ff-io.at - `ff-io.cc` targets FixedFloat (ff.io) - VirusTotal: **6 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/ff-io.cc/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=ff-io.cc - `fixfloat.vip` targets FixedFloat (ff.io) - VirusTotal: **6 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/fixfloat.vip/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=fixfloat.vip - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=fixfloat.vip - `v3simpleswap.com` targets SimpleSwap (simpleswap.io) - VirusTotal: **2 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/v3simpleswap.com/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=v3simpleswap.com - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=v3simpleswap.com - `simple-swap.dev` targets SimpleSwap (simpleswap.io) - VirusTotal: **7 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/simple-swap.dev/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=simple-swap.dev - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=simple-swap.dev - `simlpeswap.easy-exchange.pro` targets SimpleSwap (simpleswap.io) - VirusTotal: **0 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/simlpeswap.easy-exchange.pro/detection - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=simlpeswap.easy-exchange.pro - `exoduwallet.io` targets Exodus (exodus.com) - VirusTotal: **10 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/exoduwallet.io/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=exoduwallet.io - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=exoduwallet.io - `scanledgerwallet.com` targets Ledger (ledger.com) - VirusTotal: **2 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/scanledgerwallet.com/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=scanledgerwallet.com - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=scanledgerwallet.com - `trezorwalletsupport.com` targets Trezor Wallet (trezor.io) - VirusTotal: **20 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/trezorwalletsupport.com/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=trezorwalletsupport.com - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=trezorwalletsupport.com ### Diagrams
Phishing Campaign Mindmap Overview ```mermaid %%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': {'primaryColor': '#f97316', 'primaryTextColor': '#ffffff', 'primaryBorderColor': '#ea580c', 'lineColor': '#fb923c', 'secondaryColor': '#fed7aa', 'tertiaryColor': '#fff7ed'}}}%% mindmap root((Phishing Campaign
11 domains)) ))TARGETS(( ["FixedFloat"] (ff-io.at) (ff-io.cc) (fixfloat.vip) ["SimpleSwap"] (v3simpleswap.com) (simple-swap.dev) (simlpeswap.easy-exchange.pro) ["Exodus"] (exodus.net-sys.at) (exoduwallet.io) ["Bitbox Swiss"] (bitboxinsurance.com) ["Ledger"] (scanledgerwallet.com) ["Trezor Wallet"] (trezorwalletsupport.com) ))INFRASTRUCTURE(( {{"AS13335 Cloudflare"}} 188.114.96.3 188.114.97.3 104.21.17.191 172.67.178.49 104.21.11.113 172.67.191.250 {{"AS214943 Railnet"}} 158.94.210.251 213.209.129.68 {{"AS47196 Garant Park Internet"}} 46.173.214.61 ))REGISTRARS(( ("NICENIC INTERNATIONAL GROUP CO., LIMITED") ("Web Commerce Communications Limited dba WebNic.cc") ("Key-Systems GmbH") ```
